No unnecessary sympathy please!  
 They do nothing to improve their life standards. Rather most of them do kaamchori.
1. Most of them don't come to the location, clear sign of non sincerity towards profession.
A lot of them don't even know how to find an address,lack of skill and not Willing to improve it.

2. I was sick and had fracture and even after me telling them about it they were like arrange someone to pick it up from outside the society, rather than coming on the floor.

3. A lot of them fight when they are asked to come to location without calling just because we may be busy with some office call or unable to attend extra calls.

4. If they are unprofessional the how come will they be living a dream kinda job ?

सर आपने बिलकुल सही कहा प्रॉब्लम ये है इंडिया मे यहाँ क्वालिटी एजुकेशन नहीं है हम इंडियन डेवलप कंट्री से 200 साल पीछे है हमारी govt ही नहीं चाहती लोग एडुकेटेड हो, हमारे देश मे अंधविश्वास और धर्म को महत्व दिया जा रहा है एजुकेशन को नहीं, एक बड़ा कारण पापुलेशन भी है अमेरिका हमसे छेत्रफल मे भी बड़ा है और पापुलेशन भी मात्र 30cr है वहा डेवलोपमेन्ट की बात होती है हमारे देश मे धर्म, हिन्दू राष्ट्, जात पात, मुद्दा है, बल्कि असल मुद्दा एजुकेशन, स्वस्थ, और बेरोजगारी का होना चाहिए, हमारी मौजूदा govt खुद नहीं चाहती लोग इन मुद्दों पर बात करें, govt बढ़ावा दे रही धर्म के व्यापारियों को जो ढोंगी बाबा है उनको, इंडिया मे लोग तार्किक बात नहीं करते, बल्कि 80% पापुलेशन इन govt और पाखंडियो के चक्कर मे उलझी हुई है यही कारण है देश हजारों सालो मे भी डेवलप कंट्री नहीं बन सकता, कोई ऐसी govt आये जो एजुकेशन स्वास्थ्य और रोजगार पे फोकस करें, पुरे मीडिया हाउस बीके हुए है सब govt का गुणगान करने मे, सच्चाई नहीं बताई जा रही है लोगो को, और लोग बाग भी अंधभक्त बने बैठे है govt स्कूल govt हॉस्पिटल की हालत देख लो लंका लगी हुई है govt टैक्स तो अमेरिका से भी ज्यादा लेती है आम लोगो से, लेकिन उसके बदले मे सर्विस भी लोगो को नहीं देती, देश के लोगो को समझना होगा उन्हे राम मंदिर रोटी नहीं देगा, उन्हें धार्मिक गुरु रोजगार नहीं देंगे, उन्हें कोई मंदिर मस्जिद या चर्च उनका इलाज नहीं कर सकते, लोगो को सिर्फ और सिर्फ अच्छी एजुकेशन, और पापुलेशन पे कंट्रोल करके ही इस भारत देश को बचाया जा सकता है समय रहते जाग जाओ वरना इस देश को गरीब देश होने मे समय नहीं लगेगा

@dhruv, Points are valid from the gig worker’s perspective but all these companies are in loss and trying to break even. There are excessive number of such companies so to keep up with the competition, they are burning money. Also, since these jobs are unskilled, there is excess workforce available in India. So workers have no leverage. Giving 5 stars is not going to change anything in the long run.

As customers we can tip the workers and treat them respectfully. And some gig workers should pursue more skilled labour based jobs if they want a stable growth.

Its crazy how these workers are treated in India. Consumers use them to get their basic jobs done (under 10 mins) while people forget these workers are humans. Not only are we encouraging these jobs where the government or companies dont feel obliged to pay them a minimum wage like most countries do and nor do the customers use these services responsibly or so much as give them a tip. Countries other than India have a liability to pay gig workers a minimum wage and additional way for overnight shifts and for working on public holidays. Please be mindful and treat them and tip them well

I recall this specific insurance case vividly from my time as an engineer at Swiggy. The company had insured its delivery riders through a third-party insurance provider. Unfortunately, on one particular day, a rider’s brother took over a delivery, and a tragic accident occurred resulting in his death. Since he wasn't the registered rider, the insurance could not be claimed. Following this incident, I remember working on developing an anomaly detection module that would randomly capture photos of delivery executives, analyze them using AI models and notify us of such anomalies. This was designed to ensure policy compliance and prevent fraud, ultimately safeguarding both the company and its riders in similar situations.

Additionally, I've worked with companies specializing in chatbot technologies. I understand that interacting with a bot can feel different from engaging with a human agent. However, most advanced algorithms are designed to escalate complex queries to human agents when necessary. With the advent of Generative AI and large language models, this gap is narrowing significantly, making it increasingly challenging to distinguish between a bot and a human agent.

@dhruvratheeफार्मेसी काउंसिल ऑफ इंडिया द्वारा लिया जाने वाला एग्जीट एग्जाम कृपा निरस्त करे निरस्त करने करने का मुख्य बिंदु निम्न है।

1. यदि शिक्षा स्तर की गुणवत्ता को सुधारना है, पूर्ण रुप से एग्जीट एग्जाम निरस्त हो ।

2. यदि एग्जीट एग्जाम लेना ही है तो 2025 से हो, साथ पहले से लिखित में संसोधन हो व सलेबस में जोडा जाये जिससे स्टूडेन्ट लोगो को कोई दिक्कत न हो ।

3. यदि एग्जीट एग्जाम लेना ही है तो 3 पेपर की जगह 1 पेपर हो, साथ ही समय अवधि बढाया जाये

4. यदि एग्जीट एग्जाम लेना ही है तो पहले से पीपीएचटी एग्जाम के साथ लिया जाये, जिससे चयन उम्मीदवार ही फार्मासिस्ट स्टूडेन्ट का पात्र हो,

5. यदि एग्जाम लेने का अधिकार पीसीआई के पास है तो अन्य संस्था द्वारा लिया जायें उचित नहीं है। 6. यदि एग्जिट एग्जाम कराने का प्रक्रिया सरकार द्वारा 2019 से था तो क्यु नही कराया गया।

7. यदि सभी कालेजों द्वारा फार्मेसी के लिए मोटी फीस लिया जाता है तो, एग्जाम फीस में पूर्ण कटौती किया जाये, जिससे गरीब, मजदूर व बेरोजगार वर्ग को कोई दिक्कत न हो 2 साल की कठोर संघर्ष करने के बाद फिर से एग्जाम देना हो ये सही व उचित नही,

महोदय जी आपसे हाथ जोडकर प्रार्थना है, इस पर पुनः विचार कर उचित व त्वरित कदम उठाएँ अन्यथा छात्रा - छात्राओं द्वारा पुरे राज्य व राष्ट्र में धरना प्रदर्शन, व उग्र आंदोलन होने की संभावना हो सकता है ।

I deliver parcels for amazon in van. There's good money bt over the period of time, work load has increased drastically. We are now made to deliver 30% more parcels compared to 7-8months back for the same amount of money we get.

The biggest drawback is not getting any incentive for any day of the year. Whether it is diwali, Christmas or any other festive, we are not given off even if it's without pay.
Even on national holidays where double pay is mandatory, we are given single days payment.

Hi Dhruv
I would like to highlight the plight of the most important vocation in the world - Teachers, in India. Even in a city like Mumbai primary teachers earn as low as Rs.8000 per month. Early childhood teachers in most private school, especially those on contract earn even less. Even college teachers make less than 15000. Now imagine the quality and commitment level of these teachers. A housemaid earns more than that. The government must fix a minimum wage for teachers at various levels.
disclaimer: I am not a teacher, but have 2 kids and have seen gradual deterioration of teaching quality over the years.

I always thank the Delivery guys and people that drive autos,bike or cabs. A lot of time my friends and family have told me I am such a nice guy for always thanking the person but I find it amusing that they think so. Treat humans like humans, like the way we would want to treated like humans, the world will be better if we were slightly better ourselves.

Hlo dhruv sir me Zomato me job krta hu or vlog bhi dalta hu daily sach me yrr bhut mehnat ka kam hota h pr kbhi kbhi kuch customers aise mil jate h ki humko bhut sunni pdti h or company bhi kuch khas sath nhi deti hum riders ka bhut dikkat aati h sir or puri june july ki garmiyo me mene kam kiya h dupehr 11 bje se rat 10 bje tk      or 2 july 2023 ko zomato me hi kam krte hue mera accident hogya tha meri femur bone fracture hui thi uske bad mene 9 months ke bad firse Zomato pr kam krna shuru kiya kiuki mere pas koi option nhi tha job nhi mil rhi thi koi bhi or financial problem itni jyada hogyi thi ki mujhe isi line me jana pda kiuki kahi bhi mujhe 8 hajar se upr ki job nhi mil pa rhi thi kiuki mere se jyada bhari bajan bala kam nhi ho pata to isliye firr mujhe isi me job krni pdi or ab bhi kr rha hu company bhut kutti h yrr kbhi bhi kisi bhi rider ki id block kr deti h isliye me bhut hi sabdhani se kam krta hu kiuki agr meri id gyi to mujhe firse koi kam nhi mil payega ekdum Bss company ko itna smjhna chahiye ki rider ko block n kre or customers bhi acche se bat kre kbhi kbhi itna rona aata h jb koi customer chillata h kuch gussa krta h kisi bat pr to ki life me ye chl kya rha h 😭😭 plzz respect all delivery workers mene bhi kadi dhup me delivery ki hi mujhe mehnat ka pta h jb pasina behta h 40° ki kadak dhoop me ❤️

में Amazon डिलेवरी boy पूरे 1 साल में हमको छूटी बस 10 - 15 मिलती है दीपावली के दिन भी पार्सल बटवाए जाते हे हम से कोई भी त्योहार के दिन हमारी छूटी नहीं होती है।365 दिन में से लगभग 345-350 दिन काम करना पड़ता हैं। पूरे दिन गाड़ी चलाना पड़ता है और अगर कोई पार्सल में आगे से कोई चीज नहीं आई तो हमारे ऊपर इंजाम लगाया जाता है । हम लोगो को चोर बोला जाता हे। और तो और हमारी sallery  में से भी पैसे खुद खा जाते हि sallery Bank account me nhi आती phonpay ya Google pay me भेजी जाति है। ये सब लीगल nhi है फिर भी अगर इनको बोलते हे कुछ को नौकरी से हटाने को बोलते हे। हमारी sallery में से तो पैसे नहीं काटने चाइए इनको ऊपर के ऊपर पैसे खा जाते है और ना ही हमको sallery slip kuch बताते।

In the quiet hum of the evening, as the city's heartbeat softened, a Zomato rider appeared at my doorstep. His cycle, worn and weathered, bore the marks of countless journeys through bustling streets and winding lanes. His eyes, tired yet determined, reflected a sense of profound gratitude.

I have worked with Zomato for quite a long time, and would like to highlight a very crucial issue with zomato's work structure and the payout for the delivery agents, you get a daily incentive in order to perform a set number of deliveries in a certain time slot, this people have designed there algorithm so strong and so exploitative that as soon as you are about to complete the task for the day before expected time frame, the algorithm automatically gets the agents out of the order receiving que, and the agent has to wait to get that last 1 or  2 orders for HOURS, because the algorithm understands that the delivery agent might logout once they have completed the given task, and they might face shortage of delivery agents in peak business hours, so u bust your ass for 18 back to back orders since morning 7 but u can't logout at 8 Pm because there is 2 more orders pending to earn that incentive, u will be forced to stay logged in untill the peak hours are covered. trust me people it's one of the toughest job physicaly challenging and barely rewarding.
The brains behind these platforms are so corrupted all they care about is filling their pockets.

These tech-based companies can be very harsh on gig workers, but there’s another side to the story. Many of these so-called delivery agents are often rude and drive recklessly, causing problems for residents, especially elderly people. They are also frequently unhygienic and unfriendly. While it’s true that we should blame the companies for not providing basic hospitality training to these agents, we can’t ignore the issue. Since the companies aren’t addressing this, we should focus on raising awareness and creating educational events and videos for them.

Of course, not everyone can make these changes, which is why many residents end up blaming the agents themselves.

Dear Dhurve,I recently watched your video about the challenges faced by delivery boys, and I appreciate your efforts to bring attention to this topic. However, I believe there are a few points that need to be considered for a more balanced perspective.Firstly, it's important to acknowledge the dedication and hard work that delivery boys put into their jobs. Many of them rely on this work to support their families and fulfill their responsibilities. The challenges they face, including long hours, difficult working conditions, and sometimes unfair pay, are real and deserve attention. But it’s also essential to highlight that not every company or situation is the same. Many organizations are working towards improving conditions, providing benefits, and ensuring that delivery workers are treated with respect and dignity.Moreover, there are numerous stories of delivery boys who have used this job as a stepping stone to achieve bigger goals in life. While the job is challenging, it also offers opportunities for personal growth, skill development, and the possibility of moving into higher positions within the logistics and delivery industry.Instead of solely focusing on the negatives, it would be more constructive to encourage positive changes within the industry. This can include promoting fair wages, better working conditions, and opportunities for career advancement. Additionally, consumers should be made aware of the hard work and dedication that delivery personnel put into their jobs, which can lead to greater appreciation and better treatment.Thank you for initiating this conversation. I hope that together, we can continue to support and uplift those who work tirelessly in this field.

Exploitation of human workers refers to practices where employees are treated unfairly or subjected to harsh conditions for the benefit of employers or businesses. This can include low wages, excessive working hours, unsafe working conditions, lack of job security, and denial of basic rights and benefits. It often occurs in industries with weak labor regulations or in regions with limited enforcement of workers' rights. Addressing this issue typically involves improving labor laws, strengthening enforcement, and advocating for fair treatment and ethical practices.

You will be shocked sir, if you truly find out how many people across India can be classified as gig workers. This problem is not endemic to platform based services, swiggy Uber etc, a lot of big and small companies recruit people on a temporary basis and give them alternate names (instead of employees), they do the same work sitting next to the nrml employees for the same or even more amount of time, they have same or better qualification, yet they get meagre fixed monthly pay with no recognition, no increments, no benefits, no leave structures, no ID cards, no health..not even a piece of paper exists in the office with their name on it. Cos the company makes sure he cannot go to court after working there for 10-12 years and getting fired for some silly reason.  Yet people still take that job based on their circumstances and believe in false hope that the company feeds them of making them proper employees after a few years of work. They don't even get experience certificates if they leave, they cannot apply as freshers or as experienced workers. It would seem to any employer as if they were jobless for a lot of years, so these people continue as oppressed gig workers hoping for a mercy of recruitment or go for forging fake certificates and get out.
Thanks for highlighting this

श्रीगंगानगर-कोटपूतली ग्रीनफ़ील्ड एक्सप्रेसवे, राजस्थान के बजट 2024 में शामिल नौ ग्रीनफ़ील्ड एक्सप्रेसवे में से एक है. यह 290 किलोमीटर लंबा एक्सप्रेसवे, भारत-पाक बॉर्डर पर स्थित श्रीगंगानगर को किसानों के लिए नई राह दिखाएगा. इस एक्सप्रेसवे से जयपुर से श्रीगंगानगर की दूरी 60 किलोमीटर कम हो जाएगी. इससे पहले, इस रूट पर 350 किलोमीटर का सफ़र तय करने में करीब 8 घंटे लगते थे. एक्सप्रेसवे बनने के बाद, यह सफ़र 5 घंटों में पूरा हो जाएगा. 

￼

इस एक्सप्रेसवे से श्रीगंगानगर से जयपुर के लिए लंबी दूरी के शहरों की आवाजाही आसानी से हो सकेगी. साथ ही, इससे दिल्ली और जयपुर से भी सीधा संपर्क हो सकेगा. इसके अलावा, राज्य सरकार की रिपोर्ट के मुताबिक, एक्सप्रेसवे से श्रीगंगानगर से जिप्सम, खाद्य तेल, और दूसरे कृषि उत्पादों, झुंझुनूं के ग्रेनाइट पत्थर की ढुलाई भी तेज़ी से हो सकेगी.

Hello my name is Mabil Mirza, I work in a company, the name of the company is Reliance Jio, company owned by Mukesh Ambanani. This company has done a lot of wrong with all of us employees. Earlier our salary was 20000, by applying incentive we used to get 24 to 25 thousand but now Reliance Jio has reduced the salary of all of us to 10500 and why did they do it, no one has any answer. Now you think for yourself how will we run our house in 10500. I have 2 younger sons with me, one of 7 years and one of 3 years, my wife, younger brother and with me there is mom and dad, the responsibility of all of them is upper to me.  How can I manage my household expenses with a salary of Rs. 10,500? Now tell me what should I do? I am looking for another job but am not getting any job.

मैं दिल से धन्यवाद ज्ञापित करता हूं ध्रुव राठी जी का उन्होंने इतने महत्वपूर्ण मुद्दे की ओर हम सबका ध्यान आकर्षित करवाया, हम सबको गिग वर्कर्स की जिंदगी के बारे मे सोचने का एक नजरिया दिया.. वाकई ऐसे छोटे छोटे वर्कर्स की जिंदगी और रोजिरोटी कितनी मुश्किल होती हैं ये समझाने में हमारी मदद की... हम सबको भी ऐसे वर्कर्स के साथ इंसानियत से व्यवहार करना चाहिए और मदद करनी चाहिए और इनके बारे में सोचना चाहिए इनका भी परिवार है बच्चे हैं और मजबूरियां है, और हमारी चुनी हुई सरकारों को ऐसे वर्कर्स के लिए ऐसे कानून बनाने चाइए जिससे इनकी जिंदगी भी आसान हो और खुशहाल हो और सुरक्षित हो और ये अपने परिवार का भरण पोषण आराम से कर पाए... बढ़ती बेरोजगारी और महंगाई में लाखों शिक्षित नौजवान भी ऐसे वर्क करते हैं, वर्कर शिक्षित हो या अशिक्षित लेकिन उनके काम का हमेशा सम्मान करना चाहिए हम सबके प्रति सम्मान की भावना रखेंगे तो ही देश में खुशहाली आ सकती हैं और हम सबसे मिलकर ही देश बनता है .. जय हिन्द दोस्तों

हरियाणा के बेरोजगार युवाओं का आपकी सच्ची, निष्पक्ष और उच्चकोटी की पत्रकारिता को दंडवत प्रणाम।* *Sir हम हरियाणा के बेरोजगार युवा आपका ध्यान हरियाणा के एक महत्वपूर्ण और ज्वलंत मुद्दे की ओर खींचना चाहते है और आशा करते है के आप अपनी पत्रकारिता के कौशल से इस समस्या को प्रभावी तरीके से हरियाणा की जनता और सरकार के सामने प्रस्तुत करेंगे।*
 *31 मई 2024 को माननीय हरियाणा और पंजाब उच्च न्यायालय द्वारा .................. के तहत कुछ भर्तियों की रिडवर्टाइजमेंट हुई और पूर्व में कोर्ट की अंतरिम रिलीफ पर हुए सभी एग्जाम को कैंसल करके फ्रेश एडवरटाइजमेंट और 6 महीने में भर्ती प्रक्रिया पूर्ण करने का आदेश पारित किया गया। (कोर्ट ऑर्डर की एक कॉपी मैसेज के साथ संलग्न कर दी गई है) परिणामस्वरूप सरकार  फ्रेश एडवरटाइजमेंट जारी करके ग्रुप 56/57 JE or हरियाणा पुलिस का एग्जाम कंडक्ट करवाती है। इसी बीच भर्ती प्रक्रिया अपने अंतिम चरण में ही थी के 16 अगस्त को भारतीय इलेक्शन कमिशन द्वारा हरियाणा में चुनावी उद्घोषणा कर दी  जाती है और  सरकार मॉडल कोड ऑफ कंडक्ट का बहाना बनाकर 5 साल से लंबित भर्तियों से पल्ला झाड़ लेती है। लेकिन माननीय हाई कोर्ट के आदेशानुसार उपरोक्त 56/57 और JE ग्रुप की भर्तियों पर मॉडल कोड ऑफ कंडक्ट का भी कोई प्रभाव नहीं होते हुए भी लगातार सरकार विपक्ष पर भर्ती रोकने का ठीकरा फोड़कर अपना पल्ला झाड़ रही है। हरियाणा में बेरोजगारी वैसे ही देश में पहले स्थान पर है और हरियाणा को बेरोजगार रखने में सरकार भी पूर्ण भागीदार बनी हुई क्योंकि वास्तविकता यह है महोदय की आचार संहिता से इस भर्ती पर कोई रोक नहीं है क्योंकि खुद माननीय हाई कोर्ट ने 6 महीने में ये भर्ती पूरी करने के आदेश दिए हैं। लेकिन सरकार के कान पर जु तक नहीं रेंग रही। और यही नहीं महोदय, हरियाणा राज्य निर्वाचन आयोग के CEO श्री पंकज Aggarwal भी साफ़ साफ़ अपनी प्रेस कांफ्रेंस में ये कह चुके हैं की इन भर्तियों पर कोई रोक नहीं हैं।*
*और उपरोक्त ग्रुप में कुछ भर्तियां तो लगभग 12 साल से लंबित है और निम्नलिखित तारीखों पर ये एग्जाम हुए*
*1. 9 जनवरी 2021 - ग्राम सचिव*
*2. 5/6 नवंबर 2022 - CET प्री*
*3. 6 अगस्त 2023 - ग्रुप 57*
*4. 7 अगस्त 2023 - ग्रुप 56*
*5. 17 अगस्त 2024 - ग्रुप 56*
*6. 18 अगस्त 2024 - ग्रुप 57*
*7. 8 अगस्त 2024- ग्रुप 1*
*8. 9 अगस्त 2024- ग्रुप 2*

*लेकिन विडंबना की बात ये है की महोदय की इन भर्तियों के एक्जाम तो कई बार हुए लेकिन हमारी ज्वाइनिंग नही हुई ।  ये भर्ती बार बार Cancel की गयी लेकिन जैसा कि उपरोक्त बातों से ज्ञात होता है कि अभी विगत 17 तथा 18 August को ये 56 57 Group के पेपर दोबारा भी हो चुके हैं लेकिन अभी भी सरकार चुनाव के मुहाने पर खड़े होकर भी हमारी आवाज नहीं सुन रही है।   मीडिया, जिसको की लोकतंत्र के चौथे स्तंभ के रूप में जाना जाता है, आज हम सभी आपके सामने हाथ जोड़कर झोली फैलाकर आ चुके हैं । माँ बाप बूढे होते जा रहे हैं। सपनों की उम्मीद टूटती जा रहीं हैं। सब कुछ खत्म होता जा रहा है महोदय। अभी आप ही एकमात्र सहारा है हमारा। अगर अभी भी ये भर्ती नहीं हुई तो नहीं तो हमारी की हुई मेहनत का कोई मकसद नहीं रह जाएगा। हमारा दिन रात भूलकर 15  _ 15 घण्टे पढ़ना व्यर्थ हो जाएगा। हम हजारों छात्र-छात्राओं की उम्मीद अभी केवल और केवल आप हो। हम आपके दरवाजे पर आए हैं अभी आप ही हमारा सहारा हैं।*

*आपके द्वार*
*समस्त हरियाणा के बेरोजगार*
*अंतः इब सब परिस्थितियों को देखते हुए हरियाणा के बेरोजगारों ने 31 अगस्त से आर पार की लड़ाई हेतु रोहतक में* *अनिश्चितकालीन धरने का एलान कर दिया हैऔर    चूंकि इनमे से कुछ भर्तियां जैसे ग्राम सचिव, पटवारी etc. तो पिछले 12 सालो से लंबित है युवा सरकार के भर्तियों के प्रति ढीले रवैए से बहुत परेशान हैं और हरियाणा के स्टूडेंट्स में चौतरफा नकारात्मकता का माहोल बना हुआ है। बार बार अधिकारियों से मीटिंग व धरने प्रदर्शन करने के बावजूद हमे सरकार से कोई संतोषजनक उत्तर नही मिला हुआ और इन सब घटनाक्रम से हताश और निराश होकर हरियाणा का युवा कठोर फैसले लेने के लिए मजबूर है क्योंकि सरकार जिस तरह से रुख अपना रही है उससे युवा बिलकुल भी संतुष्ट नहीं है अंतः आपसे निवेदन है की हम युवाओं की इस पीड़ा को अपने पत्रकारिता के कौशल के माध्यम से सरकार के समक्ष पहुंचाए।* 
*अगर हमारी यह मांगे पूरी नहीं हुई तो युवाओं के दम पर ही 2019 में सरकार ने वापसी की थी लेकिन इस बार सरकार द्वारा युवाओं की इतनी अनदेखी सरकार को भारी पड़ सकती है*

Up primary school scam pr ek video bano bhai

One evening, I ordered dinner from a nearby restaurant. When the delivery person arrived, I noticed something was off—his eyes were red, and he looked distressed. I couldn’t help but ask if everything was okay.


At first, he hesitated, but then he confessed that he had accidentally dropped his phone while making deliveries. The phone was crucial for his job, and he didn’t have enough money to replace it. He was worried about how he would continue working and support his family, especially since his son’s school fees were due soon.


His story touched me deeply. I knew what it was like to struggle, having worked odd jobs in the past just to make ends meet. I decided to help him by giving him some money to buy a new phone. He was reluctant to accept, but I insisted, knowing how much it meant to him.


In that moment, I was reminded of the challenges we all face, and how a little kindness can make a big difference in someone’s life.

🙏😭😭😭Please translation bengali to hindi or English : আমাদের চাকমা আদিবাসীদের জন‍্য ভিডিও বানান আমাদের পার্বত‍্য চট্টগ্রামে তিন পার্বত‍্য জেলায় অনেক অত‍্যাচার নিপিরন করতেছে শত শত বছর ধরে বাংলাদেশের সেনাবাহিনী ও সেটেলার উগ্রপন্থীরা। ডেইলি পাহাড়ি মেয়েদের ধর্ষন করতেছৃ সেটেলার বাঙালিরা আমরা প্রতিবাদ করতে গেলে সেনাবাহিনীরা বাধা দেই এবং আমরা যদি আন্দোলন করি কোনো নিউজ করতে দেই না বাংলাদেশে সেনাবাহিনী। আমরা অনেক কষ্টে আছি আমাদেরকে সাহায্য করুন। বার বার আমাদেরক হেনষ্টা করতেছে ধর্ম নিয়ে ও করে। আমাদেরকে হাইলাইট করুন জাতিসংঘ জানার জন‍্য বড় বড় বিদেশি সেনেলকে পার্বত্য চট্টগ্রাম এর কান্না দেখান। 🙏🙏🙏আমাদের বাংলাদেশ আদিবাসীদের বাঙালি বিনিয়ে রেখেছে আমরা কখনোই বাঙালি নই। আমাদের সাংবিধানিক সিকৃতি দিতে হবে💪✊ পার্বত‍্য চট্টগ্রাম থকে সেনাশাসন প্রত‍্যার করতে হবে। পাহাড়ে সেনাবাহিনী থাকলে প্রতিদিন আমাদের উপর মারধর করে অত‍্যাচার জাইগা বেদখল করে। উন্নয়ন নামে পার্ক রিসোট রেস্টুরেন্ট বানাই  আমাদের ঘরবাড়ি ভেঙে দেই পুরিয়ে দে আগুনে। আমাদেরকে বাচাও🙏🙏🙏

I was eagerly waiting for this type of video because I also worked as a courier delivery boy. Believe me, my life became a nightmare during that time. I worked in Masjid Bunder, Mumbai, delivering couriers. They build 5 to 7-floor buildings without elevators, and then they ask you to wait 'just 2 minutes' for a task that should only take 10 seconds, like getting a signature, but it actually takes more than 10 minutes.They would ask me to remove my shoes before coming inside, even though they could easily walk 10 steps outside to receive the courier. However, it pains me to say that many of those who treated me poorly were Muslims, just like me. They would call me to deliver their couriers as if I were their servant.

As an ecommerce seller with 15 years of experience, I've seen the dark side of the industry. Marketplaces like Amazon, flipkart and other  dictate terms to sellers, imposing rigorous rules and regulations that can lead to account suspensions and financial losses. Algorithms control our performance, visibility, and profits, prioritizing the marketplace's interests over ours. Customers often exploit us through false claims, returns, and reviews, and marketplaces frequently side with them. This has taken a toll on our mental health and well-being, causing emotional distress, financial struggles, and burnout. It's time for marketplaces to reform their policies and treat sellers fairly, and for us to share our stories and advocate for change. I am an ecommerce seller from the last 15 years and worked with every Indian marketplace , knows them in and out ,

People are crazy about two things these days - excessive wealth and excessive leisure time to waste. 
The gig jobs can seem very profitable from the outset due to potential to earn 15k per month. However, luck plays major role here. Compared to this a salesman job in a shop may be less paying but it's assured income every month. However people don't want salesmen jobs at shops  because they want to roam about thinking they are touring. 

Again, when the online companies are exploiting these people, why should they continue this economy and make the customers responsible for caring them. The gig guys get what they wanted. The online companies would hardly share their profits with these guys.

I remember one night, I booked an Uber bike late from the office. The rider arrived, but he seemed reluctant to take me to my location, knowing he rarely got a return ride from there at that hour. He was visibly downcast, but when he dropped me off at home, I paid him double the fare and thanked him sincerely. His face lit up with happiness, and seeing that joy on his face made me happy as well.

हर रोज़ सुबह उठकर, मेहनत से करता है शुरुआत,
कंधों पर बैग लटकाए, चलता है पूरे शहर की बात।
चाहे धूप हो, चाहे बरसात,
हर समय करता है लोगों का साथ।मंज़िल तक पहुंचाने का वो रखता है विश्वास,
हर पैकेज में बसी होती है किसी की आस।
रास्ते में आती हैं मुश्किलें अनगिनत,
पर डिलीवरी बॉय नहीं रुकता, बढ़ता है सतत।हर मुस्कान के पीछे छिपी होती है उसकी मेहनत,
हर दरवाजे पर दस्तक देकर, बांटता है अपनापन।
जितनी बार वो आता है, लाता है खुशियों का संदेश,
डिलीवरी बॉय है, सच में वो एक फरिश्ता विशेष।उसकी मेहनत को सलाम, उसका सम्मान है महान,
डिलीवरी बॉय की कहानी में बसी है अनकही पहचान।
हर कदम पर वो करता है संघर्ष और समर्पण,
डिलीवरी बॉय, तुम्हारी सेवा को नमन!

भारत में, जैसा कि पूरी दुनिया में होता है, बहुत सारा गिग वर्क अस्थिर बना हुआ है; पारंपरिक रोजगार सुरक्षा की कमी गिग वर्करों को अनिश्चित स्थिति में डाल देती है। गिग वर्क के आम नुकसानों को समझाते हुए, सलाउद्दीन ने “आपके नियोक्ता द्वारा आपकी पेंशन, स्वास्थ्य बीमा, सवेतन बीमारी की छुट्टी या सवेतन छुट्टी का कवरेज न होना”, साथ ही “छूट पैकेज या बर्खास्तगी नोटिस अवधि के संबंध में न्यूनतम नौकरी सुरक्षा” को सूचीबद्ध किया है।

भारत में गिग-वर्कर संगठित होना एक महत्वपूर्ण क्षण है। सितंबर 2021 में, सलाउद्दीन और IFAT ने सुप्रीम कोर्ट में एक याचिका दायर की , जिसमें अन्य बातों के अलावा, ऐप-आधारित परिवहन और डिलीवरी कर्मचारियों के लिए महामारी राहत की मांग की गई, जो अपना अस्तित्व बनाए रखने के लिए संघर्ष कर रहे हैं। सलाउद्दीन को उम्मीद है कि भारत के लाखों गिग वर्कर भारत सरकार पर दबाव बनाने के लिए लामबंद हो सकते हैं । सरकार ने पहले ही एक कानून को मंजूरी दे दी है जो गिग वर्करों को सामाजिक सुरक्षा लाभों के लिए पात्र बनाएगा, हालांकि 2020 के बाद से इस पर बहुत कम प्रगति हुई है।

यह सिर्फ़ भारत ही नहीं है जहाँ बदलाव हो रहे हैं। कई देशों में, नीति निर्माता गिग इकॉनमी में सुधार के लिए नए कानून बनाकर कामगारों और उपभोक्ताओं के दबाव का जवाब दे रहे हैं। फिर भी, कदम सक्रिय होने के बजाय काफ़ी हद तक प्रतिक्रियात्मक बने हुए हैं, और गिग कामगारों के बढ़ते समूह की ज़रूरतों को पूरा करने के लिए विनियमनों को अभी लंबा रास्ता तय करना है।

विनियामक धीरे-धीरे आगे बढ़ रहे हैं

गिग वर्क में कई तरह के रोजगार शामिल हैं, जिनमें एजेंसी और अस्थायी काम, अल्पकालिक अनुबंध और ऐप-आधारित भूमिकाएँ शामिल हैं। हालाँकि इसके पैमाने को पकड़ने की कोशिश करने वाले आँकड़े बहुत अलग-अलग हैं, लेकिन यह स्पष्ट है कि हाल के वर्षों में गिग वर्क का काफ़ी विस्तार हुआ है। यू.के. में, 2016 और 2021 के बीच गिग वर्कर्स की संख्या दोगुनी हो गई । अमेरिका में, यह 10% से अधिक श्रमिकों के लिए आय का मुख्य स्रोत है।

भारत में, जैसा कि पूरी दुनिया में होता है, बहुत सारा गिग वर्क अस्थिर बना हुआ है; पारंपरिक रोजगार सुरक्षा की कमी गिग वर्करों को अनिश्चित स्थिति में डाल देती है। गिग वर्क के आम नुकसानों को समझाते हुए, सलाउद्दीन ने “आपके नियोक्ता द्वारा आपकी पेंशन, स्वास्थ्य बीमा, सवेतन बीमारी की छुट्टी या सवेतन छुट्टी का कवरेज न होना”, साथ ही “छूट पैकेज या बर्खास्तगी नोटिस अवधि के संबंध में न्यूनतम नौकरी सुरक्षा” को सूचीबद्ध किया है।

During my tough time I was working with an e-commerce franchise as a delivery boy and I use to travel 15-20 kms per day to deliver the goods and they use to pay 16/-rs per delivery and zero penny if order was cancelled or customer asks us to deliver later bt overall I was earning 300-350rs per day and petrol expenses were around 100-130rs per day and I use to carry heavy bag on my back and ppl use to treat me like an culprit or goon and always kept me wait for minutes outside and those days were horrible in my life... And I know the pain and hardwork gigs will put daily and thank you @dhruv Rathee for highlighting this untold issue of growing India...

Bt as an experience guy I can tell you that we are helping ecommerce companies to grow bt they are not thinking about us...😔

Dear Dhruv , like many others in India & outside side India I used to watch/admire you for your non-partisan views . However I felt disappointed & bit cheated when you carefully avoided producing any video on sensitive topic Bharat Bandh of 21st August to protest the Supreme Court decision on Sub-categorization of SC,ST & creamy layer application of same communities on 1st August 2024. It’s like continuations of ignoring marginalized communities in India media which doesn’t feel unintentional or non-discriminatory. You are good YouTuber & aware person who tries to spread truthful awareness amongst youths who don’t have time to understand of current issues. I request you to make video on same Supreme Court ruling on 1st August 2024 to uphold your fairness towards marginalized communities of India. You & your team would have realized that since you haven’t made video on this issue , many youths of marginalized communities feel you don’t understand & represent them leading them to move away from you. It’s not matter of business but about people & maintaining faith of people in you .

These videos deserves the same attention as controversial topics ones get.

Swiggy se

1. Every time sending out of zone and had to come back empty to zone to get orders.

2. Old building no lift climbing 4 floors to deliver the order.

3. One mistake and heavy penalty.

4. Scorching heat, heavy rain, winter, heavy traffic, long signals waiting, pot holes etc.. etc.. 

5. Delivery in high rise building with so much security entry and queue for service lift going up and coming down takes at least 20 minutes to deliver after reaching the delivery location  on the other hand customer has access to 8 lift and it will take 2 minutes to come and take the parcel but they want delivery at their office door step and we get 25/- for that order.

6. Company only keeps extra surge bonus only on festivals occasion where company needs delivery riders to fulfill their order load because many riders who wants to celebrate their festival won't work so in that case company gives greeds of some xtra money and on the rest of the days company makes rider a slave.

मैं दिल्ली एनसीआर में पोर्टर कंपनी में सर्विस करता हूं 90% प्रतिसत ग्राहक कोई भी लोकेशन डाल देते हैं। और फिर जब लोकेशन पर जाकर हम ग्राहक को कॉल करते है तो पता चलता है जहां की लोकेशन है ग्राहक से समान वहा से 3 km या 4 km कभी कभी तो 5 7 km भी जाना होता है और जब ग्राहक को बोलते है लोकेशन अपडेट करने को तो ग्राहक बोलते हैं के हमे नही आता है अपडेट करना आप यहीं आ जाओ बिना  लोकेशन अपडेट किए फेर भी अपडेट नही होता है। और पेट्रोल के साथ साथ टाइम भी खराब होता है हमारी तरफ से ऑर्डर कैंसल करने का कोई ऑप्शन भी नही होता है कॉल सेंटर कॉल करो तो वहां से बताया जाता है के आप चले जाओ फेयर बढ़ कर आएगा। लेकिन जब राइड एंड करते है तो फेयर उतना ही रहता है फिर कॉल सेंटर कॉल करके उसको परेशानी बताओ तो बोलते है फेयर इतना ही ये अपडेट नही हुआ है। इस सब मैं जितना टाइम और पेट्रोल बरबाद होता है उतने में बंदा एक राइड और पूरी करले

I had worked with both Zomato and Rapido during my free time, and I must say, Rapido stands out for its flexibility and adjustability. As a delivery partner, Rapido literally gave freedom to choose when and how much I want to work.
I can easily manage my schedule to suit my needs

Zomato's system is more rigid with multiple restrictions and if u not responding to 2-3 trip then it can lead to multiple calls and restrictions on your gigs.
Rapido Is ideal for those who want to work on their own terms, without being tied down to a strict schedule.

Fun fact : In zomato you have to pay 1300 as joining fee, and if u want Jackets, raincoat, helmet nd other things then u need to pay extra nd it comes with zomato printed 
While in rapdio everything is completely free
U just need to create account nd u r them captain

Another interested thing 
while other platform are taking lots of commission from clients nd partner 
Rapido is taking only 10-15 rs per day as commission.
i wasn’t so fortune to work with this system but i have shown lots advertisement nd Received msg from Rapido official in last few months

I'm sure you have tested gig workers multiple times then came to this conclusion, as it's unjustifiable in 2-3 instances. 

1. Just like some platforms, some gig workers are also conniving. 
2. Customers also face worker's major behavioural issues & platforms don't take cognizance of that either. 
3. Rules & regulations are needed for both platforms & gig workers, safe guarding customers as well, with a grievance redressal mechanism.

मैं भी ब्लिंकिट में डिलीवरी ब्वॉय हु। 

भाई ने जब बीजेपी के विरोध में आवाज उठाई थी तब मुझे लगता था की . ये सिर्फ ट्रेडिंग टॉपिक पर वीडीओ बनाते है ।
लेकिन आज जब भाई ने एक GIG पार्टनर की रियलिटी बताई इसके लिए भाई को दिल से धन्यवाद ❤❤❤।🙏🙏🙏

वैसे तो भाई ने वीडीओ ने बहुत सी समस्या को गहराई से बताया है ।
कुछ बाते मैं भी बताना चाहता हु।
 गिग बुक करने के बाद हमारे पास ऑर्डर अलर्ट आता है उसको एक्सेप्ट करने के बाद ही हमको ऑर्डर और कस्टमर लोकेशन के बारे में पता चलता है ।
एक बार ऑर्डर अलर्ट एक्सेप्ट करने के बाद डिलीवरी ब्वॉय को किसी भी कंडीशन में डिलीवर करना होता है चाहे उस ऑर्डर का कितना भी वेट हो या फिर चाहे ऐसी जगह का जहां की लिफ्ट ना हो और 5 फ्लोर तक सीढ़ी से जाना पड़े.

मैं एक अपनी अभी हाल की एक बात बताता हु कस्टमर ने काफी मात्रा में पानी का ऑर्डर किया जिनका की वेट करीब  70 kg तक था ।
कंपनी की तरफ से मेरे हेल्प ले एक डिलीवरी पार्टनर दिया गया .
हम दोनो किसी तरह ऑर्डर लेकर कस्टमर के लोकेशन तक गए ।
 कस्टमर का फ्लैट जिस सोसाइटी में था वहा पर टावर के पास डिलीवरी ब्वॉय को गाड़ी ले जाना अलाऊ नही था ।
हम लोगो ने गार्ड से काफी रिक्वेस्ट की वजन जादा है गाड़ी ले जाने दो बट उन लोगो के लिए सोसाइटी का रूल मानवता से जादा उपर इसीलिए उन्होंने अपनी ड्यूटी निभाते हुए गाड़ी नहीं जाने दिया ।
इसी बिच मैने कस्टमर को कॉल करके बोल दिया की आपने इतना जादा ऑर्डर कर दिया है गार्ड गाड़ी ले जाने के लिए रोक रहे है ।
लेकिन कस्टमर को ये बात बुरी लग गई की मैंने ये कैसे बोल दिया की अपने जादा ऑर्डर कर दिया है।
 फिर हम लोग किसी तरह ऑर्डर लेकर कस्टमर के गेट के बाहर पहुंचे फिर कस्टमर ने हमको इस बात के लिए डाट लगाई की हमने ये कैसे बोल दिया की अपने जादा ऑर्डर कर दिया है।
कस्टमर का ये बोलना था कि Blinkit हमको ऑर्डर करने का ऑप्शन दे रहा है तो डिलीवरी ब्वॉय ये कैसे बोल सकता है कि हमने जादा ऑर्डर किया ।
 फिर किसी तरह हम लोग अपनी गलती कि माफ़ी मांगकर वापस आए 
लेकिन कस्टमर का गुस्सा कम नही हुआ और उन्होंने मेरे ऑर्डर की मिसिंग कंप्लेन डाल दी और कंपनी द्वारा मेरा पैसा काट लिया गया ।

ये बात मैने अपने स्टोर मैनेजर को बताई तो उन्होंने कहा कि टिकेट रेस कर दो ।
 सिर्फ यही नहीं ऐसे ही बहुत दर्द होते है जो की एक डिलीवरी ब्वॉय ही समझ सकता है ।
 राठी भाई का धन्यवाद जो की उन्होंने हम अनजान लोगो का अपना समझ कर हमारा दर्द समझा ।❤❤❤

please make a video on the work of GDS gramin dak sevaks in india. i am also working as a gramin dak sevak... according to government our working hours are min 4 to maximum 5. but we have to work 9 to 10 hours a day.... many times we don't get holidays. many works like ippb we do they do not consider our ippb transactions in our work ....but also they force us to do it.... they give us incentives for account opening....but for deposit and withdrawal transactions of ippb they do not give any incentives as well as they do not consider our hardwork in our duty.....and they always harrass us by saying that we do not work hard.....in four hours we have to tell peoples to open SB RD SSA TD and PLI RPLI and IPPB TATA aditya birla niva bupa insurance policies we also have to deliver letters....we have to perform SB RD SSA IPPB transactions in these four hours...we also don't get office....to get office on rent they give us only 200rs ....there are a lot of problem GDS in our country are facing.... plz make a video on the reality of work of GDS .....

मैंने छोटे कस्बे में कोरियर डिलीवरी का काम 1 साल किया है।जहाँ हमे रोज 50 km ड्राइव करके 60 पार्सल डिलीवर करने पड़ते थे।
1)30% कस्टमर फोन नही उठाते/लेने से मना कर देते है/कल लेने को बोलते है।/बोलते है कि गलती से ऑर्डर हो गया।
2)हर पार्सल पे मात्र 13 रुपये मिलते है।कैंसल होने पे कुछ नही मिलता।
3)हफ्ते के 1500-3000 रुपये बनते थे।
4)छुट्टी लेने पर निकालने की धमकी मिलती थी।
5)बारिश में रेनकोट पहनकर डिलीवरी करने को बोला जाता था।
6)ज्यादतर(50%-60%)को बात करने की तमीज नही होती थी।
7)बहुत कस्टमर घर से बाहर आने के लिए बहुत टाइम लेते थे।जल्दी के लिए बोलने पर बोलते थे कि कैंसल कर दो।
8)बहुत कस्टमर घर तक बुलाकर 10 मिनट बकैती करके कैंसल कर देते थे।

Hi sir  I'm a woman hairstylist catagory working in mumbai in urban company,company takes 1600rs per month and promise to give 57 jobs in month apart from 20 % comission but it's seen that many times they send a leads but it gets cancelled and they count it in 57 jobs and many of us think it's fake leads to show they are giving jobs,some times we get high amount job and if there is no balance amount in our account we add more money to get that job and take that lead but after sometime it gets cancelled and the money which we added to get lead gets added to company for getting future jobs we see that they manipulate us financially and mentally so pls do something we have seen a stylist who was so mentally broken he went to office and requested the manager to resolve his issue otherwise he will burn himself in office by putting petrol on himself we don't know what happened to him after that because we were there for just that  day, imagine the trauma which we face and now we get only 1 cancellation per month,more than 1 we face action,now they pressurized us to purchase products from company only and many more new problems we are facing,

ऐसा ही railway trackmainter का हाल है 
Trackmainter रात दिन लगे हुए, लेकिन इन्हे   कोई promotion नहीं दिया जाता है 
यहाँ तक इसे इज्जत भी नही दिन जाती है,
Trackmainter काम  थोड़ा mistake करते है, तो direct train हादसा हो जाता है
आज देश में train हादसा का मुख्य कारण 1.Trackmainter को देश में value नहीं है
2.track maintain केलिए आवश्यक कर्मचारी है ही नही 
3. Grade 1800 और1900 वाले से higher grade वाले जैसे grade 2400,और 2800 वाले कार्य कराये जाते है,

There's something truly vile about people who do not offer a glass of water and their thanks to their delivery executives. I mean, it might not be much to you but it definitely can be a big deal to them. I have met delivery executives who were glad when talking to me briefly because I always offered them cold water on summer days and asked them to take their time with their deliveries when faced with  bad weather. Goodness, this is the least we can do. We're humans but these days it seems that the majority of us have lost their humanity.

Dear Sir Ji,I am writing to bring to your urgent attention a grave issue concerning the Community Health Officers (CHOs) of the UP NHM, who are currently on strike at the NHM office in Lucknow.These CHOs, many of whom are young women, have been tirelessly working in various districts far from their homes. After joining the department unmarried, many of them have now settled into married life. However, the absence of a transfer policy within the UP NHM has left them stranded in districts far from their sasural, causing significant personal and family distress.These women are not just facing isolation in unfamiliar cities with inadequate salaries, but are also vulnerable to exploitation and harassment by NHM officers. The lack of support and a clear transfer policy is taking a severe toll on their mental and emotional well-being, leading to extreme cases where some have tragically taken their own lives.This is a serious issue that demands immediate attention. I urge you to use your platform to bring this to light and advocate for these women, who are in desperate need of a fair and humane transfer policy. They need your voice to ensure their safety and dignity.Thank you for considering this crucial issue.

Very relevant video! It’s a laborious & difficult job! No doubt!

There has to be a regulation drafted & implemented for the gig-economy to control exploitation of people! 

As customers, the least we can all vow to do is be kind, say a thank you, offer water, always rate 5, and add an appreciation note  (it’s just a few clicks for us) - unless something major has happened!

Personally, esp. for delivery folks, I follow some ground rules; 
Any order I place on weekends, or after 8pm (I feel guilty, since I’d personally never prefer working post 8pm or the weekends) hence, I always tip between 20-30% of my total order value (like a self imposed luxury/convenience charge), during summers I never order during peak afternoon time (12-4pm), during rains I don’t order if it’s already raining & incase I place an order, the weather turns bad and the delivery guy has to come in the rain - I apologise and tip. 

Not ordering also doesn’t help, since they wouldn’t earn if people don’t order. The world is stressful & unfair as it is - we can all try & make it slightly better with our personal dealings, in whatever little way we can.

महा ज्ञानी तुम तो जर्मनी में रहते हो तो कैसे हमारे देश शब्द का प्रयोग करते हो। वीडियो बनाना है तो बनाओ कैसे पश्चिमी देश भारतीय मजदूरों का शोषण करते हैं? इसका हर कोण से उजागर करो और अपने आकाओं को उपदेश दो। यहां तक कि इटली की सरकार तक को स्पष्टीकरण देना पड़ा। तुम तो अभी अभी वहां गये हो। मैं तो सन् 1984 से वहां जाता रहा हूं। और दर्शकों को बता दूं कि कैसे आम यूरोपियन यूएस की नीतियों से सहमत नहीं है। पर मजबूरी वश चुप रहता है। इतने ज्ञानी एवं सत्यवादी हो तो, इह पर भी प्रकाश डाला करो। इस पर भी प्रकाश डाला करो कि गणित, भूगोल, भौतिक शास्त्र, खगोल शास्त्र, मेडिकल साइंस, रसायन शास्त्र, दर्शन शास्त्र ये सभी भारतवर्ष की देन है। थोड़ा अपने ज्ञान से पश्चिमी देशों को भी अवगत कराओ । आशा है कि तुमकै जर्मन भाषा का भी ज्ञान होगा।

Dhruv Rathee has to understand the competition level between the companies. Companies work on Hub and scope model, one-to-many models. These companies are in platform business. My analysis are as follows: -
1) Customer want any order should be deliver within 10 minutes, if the order is not received in 10 minutes, automatically customer is triggered to be alerted. But still here patience of customer works well. If the order is not received in 15 minutes, the customer feels that the order is delivered to some other customer, but if the order doesn't reach in 20-25 minutes customer gets panic. Some time the delay in delivery may be due to high traffic congestion, vehicle breakdown and other reason. If there is delay in receiving the order, Gig worker has to face the wrath of customer. Now if the company change their commitment from 10 minutes delivery to 30 minutes delivery, the stress level on Gig workers will reduce drastically, but company will loose the business. Hence it is the neck of the funnel situation, business will be in turbulent state. But such companies if survive in this state will do well in future.
2) Second reason is also due to the customer. Study shows that if customer place the order with minimum order value of Rs. 400/- or Rs. 500/-. Then it will be beneficial to both companies and the Gig workers. Company is ready to pay Rs.50 per such order to Gig workers. But in real situation, the companies receive maximum orders in the range of Rs. 100/-   ----   Rs. 250/-. Hence the payment per order to Gig worker reduces to Rs.25/- or Rs. 15/-.
Same approach company adopts for taxi service.
Now this is good case study, any business with cut-throat competition but demand is high. Then how to flourish keeping exploitation minimum.

In Pakistan, I used to live at a rental in Dha lahore. One night a rider arrived with my food but the guy seriously could not even get up from his bike and tripped while doing so. I had to run towards him because he was in the middle of the road and dark and a car was approaching him. Had to stop the car. But when I saw the rider he was just sitting there like a lifeless person. This was the most terrible incident I had seen. I actually tipped him later on thank god that the car had stopped otherwise usually in my country even in a residential area, idiots drive like they are on a highway.

The riders face just described the state of gig workers in whole south asia.

Sadly the problem is because of unbridled capitalism without proper competition, as an economist said recently. If one company enters the market, then it will be very difficult for another one to enter it profitably , partly, it is said, because of the plethora of rules and regulations. 
This problem is NOT restricted to India(so no point in blaming our rulers alone and frankly any government can only do so much). About 4 years ago, there were a series of exposes aired on TV5 Monde Asie , a French TV channel . The industries studied were the hotel cleaners, scrap segregation, those viewing videos (for censoring) on various online platforms prior to uploading, the regular delivery guys etc. All companies including Facebook, Google etc were investigated by one feisty lady who was the documentary presenter. She made the country chief executives run for cover when she asked them why basic French laws like living wages, safety equipment etc were not followed. But do you think anything happened in France after all these eposes? I doubt
The problem is the super rich just do not have a heart, whether here or in France or anywhere else. Their greed, ego , craze for power is just something an ordinary common man cannot even understand. Their connections help them escape the law of the land

My father was working as a delivery boy for Big Basket. One day, he fell into a deep pit and sustained serious injuries. The company had given him a form stating that if any health issues were faced, compensation would be provided. However, when we admitted him to the hospital, the company stopped picking up our calls, and no expenses were covered. Later, when he tried to rejoin the company, his ID was blocked now he works as a e-rikshaw driver

I am a gig worker, and I work 12 hours a day. On average, I earn 800 rupees daily. Out of this, I spend 200 rupees on fuel for my bike and another 200 rupees on daily expenses, leaving me with just 400 rupees a day. At the end of the month, I also have to pay for bike servicing. I have to deliver parcels even when it's raining heavily, under a scorching sun, or in intense cold. On top of this, the company levies a lot of penalties if a gig gets cancelled or an order is late in being delivered.

I'm thankful to you Dhruv Rathee sir because of raising voice against these companies.

Hello everyone,
I worked as a gig worker for Swiggy in Pune for a brief period of one month in 2018, primarily to explore the city's cultural fabric. (Not to earn money but explore a different perspective of life). I found their working culture to be very exploitative. They would call me even if I had signed off from the app, and there were constant orders coming in, with a limit of only 3-5 cancellations per month. Late-night shifts were particularly challenging, as some individuals would order food to isolated areas, pressure us to cancel the order, and even snatch the food away.
The gig workers come from a very poor financial background - Construction labour son, auto driver's son, restaurant waiters son, factory workers son. They just want money to survive and nothing else.

Hi everyone, let's make the lives of delivery personnel a bit more comfortable. 
Start by greeting them warmly and offering them water if they need it. 
If the order was placed during extreme weather conditions like rain or intense heat, consider giving them a tip. 
Also, tip them for handling large or delicate orders—if you can afford a ₹1000 order, a ₹50 tip isn’t too much to ask. 
During festivals, let's share some sweets with them. 
Remember that traffic can cause delays, so try not to get upset, instead, call them to let them know it's okay. 
If the food isn't great, it's the restaurant's fault, not the delivery person's. 
Let's show kindness and understanding. Thank you.

Hello everyone. I worked as an Uber/Ola rider for sometime to understand how this whole system works at the basic level when I was in Delhi. It was really sad to realise that company collects such a high commission from the overall fare and the customers treat riders like sh*t. I never knew the situation was so bad unless I experienced the same myself. I saw a few customers who acted like I owe them my life for being my customer. So, as Dhruv already requested, please be kind to these guys. They're working really hard for their families in inhumane conditions. And a rule of thumb, always say "thank you" to them whenever you utilise any of their services. Thank you!

Kunal kamra as gig

As a desktop worker, I initially felt disheartened during the COVID era, seeing gig workers earn more than I did. However, after joining Zomato, I realized how every penny truly matters. Gig workers may earn more upfront, but about 70% of their income goes directly to fuel expenses, leaving only 30% to take home. From that small portion, they also have to cover costs for minor vehicle repairs, like brake or flat tire repairs. I was overwhelmed with emotion when my vehicle broke down in the middle of the road during heavy rains and i coudn't able to deliver the order at that time. Salute to me and all other gig workers for the tremendous work.

रोज़ धूप में तपते, कभी बारिश में भीगे,  
रास्तों की हर कठिनाई से ये नहीं सिहरते।  
डिलीवरी बॉय, तेरे हौसलों को मेरा सलाम,  
तू हमें घर बैठे देता, ज़िंदगी का आराम।

सुबह से रात तक, दौड़ते कदमों की ये कहानी,  
हर पैकेज में छुपी होती, मेहनत की निशानी।  
मुस्कान लिए चेहरे पर, थकान का नहीं कोई नाम,  
तेरे समर्पण को हर दिल से, दिल से प्रणाम।

सर्दी-गर्मी, तूफान चाहे आए,  
तेरा हौसला कभी न डगमगाए।  
तेरे बिना सूनी होती, ये ख़ुशियों की डगर,  
डिलीवरी बॉय, तू ही तो है, हर घर की कदर।

हर पैकेज में है, तेरी मेहनत का एहसास,  
तेरे बिना अधूरी है, ये दुनिया का हर प्रयास।  
तुजसे ही सजती है, हमारे सपनों की ये राह,  
डिलीवरी बॉय, तेरा होना ही, सबसे बड़ा उपहार।

I work as a courier , i take my 5 yr old with me , trust me , dont feel pity on us , we have the liberty to choose which order we hv to take , if its worth it we accept , no one forced me to work as a courier , if its corona , raining heavy or hot as hell , its my choice to stay home or work to deliver , company earns in commission , i earn on orders  sometimes personal orders as well , mujpe koi daya matt karo , , i choose to work as courier on my on terms , paisa kam hein ya jyada vo mera lookout hein , mera bacha ko to mazza aata hein , ghumne milta hein , timepaas ho jaata hein uska , job is good , but dont feel sorry fr us . We have a choice to decline or not accept orders .

Kiss bhi gig worker ya freelancer ke saath galat koi hiring company nahi balki  khud customers Karte hain. Ek market jaisi demand karegi, company waisi  service degi.
 From a buyers perspective: arey! Ye swiggy wala zyada charge Kar Rahe Hai, delivery aur order,  dono per.
From a mediators perspective: if we incur 20 percent loss on each order , we will be indebted and may go out of business, how can we prevent it?we can compensate from our delivery 'partners'. This is where the problem emerges. Hume sab cheez Ghar baithe ,free mein chahiye, but nothing comes for free, someone has to pay ,and that someone becomes the labour class.

I  myself m  working in a unorganized sector as freelancer, as a business owner , as a worker , trying to pay a million rupee debt of my father by relying on average indian subcontinental mentality: arey ! Tum majdoori karke humse zyada kamaa lete ho! We can't see others growing than ourselves and this is the reason why labour's are exploited. I feel their suffering as my own, why just delivery partners ? Have you ever wondered about a vegetable vendor, a auto rickshaw driver , a plumber ,electrician, a carpenter and so on, even they could not afford a decent life without being exploited. It's a universal issue, not just from a company ,and a labour or gig worker perspective , but psychi of a hyperconsumerist market. We as buyers are the root of the problem.

Sir I am an urban company home appliance repair technician partner. The company charges us an amount of more than 10000 rupees every month and gives us only 50 hours leave every month The company says here that they will give us 85 jobs every month But if for any reason we take more than fifty hours of leave like if we are sick then the company does not refund us even a single rupee and the company takes it all. Every day the price of goods is increasing but every day the price of spare parts in Urban Company is being reduced more and more due to which our earnings are decreasing.  Please make a second episode of this thanks to us for highlighting these major complaints.

I wasn't aware of the evil practices of these delivery apps. Once I ordered groceries from Blinkit and noticed the eggs are missing. Very innocently, I raised the complained to the Blinkit. A few hours later I am getting a call from my parents that the same delivery man is at the door crying and swearing that he dint take the eggs and now his account is blocked and he won't get any gig for 10 days. He said his mom is unwell and he has no money. He fell on my parents feet and requested them to talk to his supervisor to convince him to give his job back. I was on the phone with his supervisor and he was very nonchalant and basically told me that delivery man has to bear the consequences. I felt so guilty for even raising the complaint in the first place that for mere eggs I am robbing him of his daily earning. I wanted to take my complaint back but there was no such option.
After several calls with supervisors we got his account reinstated and gave him 1000 bucks if it could compensate for his loss.

This made me fearful of raising any complaint because the delivery personnel may bear the brunt of it all because they have everything to lose.

Company will raise thier hands saying he had a fake ID

What an idealistic world you live in my friend. Criticism for the companies that created lakhs of new jobs, giving a very decent 20k+ salary to those in metros and all you see is 4 instances where things got bad. Yes it’s unfortunate, but this isn’t Europe. We’re not a rich country, the payments and timings are due to the market forces. If you wanted to increase their pay, the cost burden will fall on the customer that means less orders- less jobs- less money pool.

All the platforms have increased service fees which they charge from customers. Today I pay 30% more for any online food order when I account for difference with menu price, fees and other charges, as compared with eating the meal at the restaurant. A big chunk of that should be shared with their delivery boys and if they don't do it then there is a serious accountability issue.
India is a cost conscious country and if these market places policy don't favour their workers and also don't favour their customers then its hard to imagine a long term future for them.

I have worked in Zepto Zomato Swiggy and it was horrible first I was working on Zepto 10hr a day earning 15rs per order and completing 25 26 orders a day and I was spending 250 to 300 petrol a day I was earning literally nothing and working 10hr as a slave after then I shifted to Zomato it was better then zepto in terms of earning money I was same hours a day like my previous job but earning 
300rs more in Zomato but while working Zomato is more profitable but more horrible bad sleeping time not able eat food because i was alone I don’t have anyone to look after me I was living by myself daily eat street food to save some money because no one there to prepare food for me or washing my clothes so I work 6 day a week and 1 days take rest on that day I wash my clothes and take some rest and Zomato made me crying I was exhausted customer doesn’t understand just complaining about me for being late because of the mall in kalyan shit mall don’t allow us to enter in the parking lot and the mall so Zomato and Swiggy hired employees to take from the mall food stalls and give us outside the mall and late 30 mins every order so we waited until they bring the order and were we waiting is a non parking space so we cannot leave our vehicle if we leave they just take our vehicle and fine 700rs away from us and Swiggy is also same like Zomato but less order and they are a piece of shit because they cut 40rs if you deny a order some I have deny because my phone about to die or its getting late many more and they also cancel my incentive for denying the order and Zomato Swiggy pay order by Km how long is your order that higher you get paid if the order under 1, 2.5 km you will get paid 24 27 rupees that order 2.5, 4 km you will paid 37 44 51 something like that and this is the order mostly I get my kalyan area sometimes you really long kalyan to Ambernath or badlapur too once I got a order kalyan Khadakpada to badlapur railway station near I got paid 211 rs after I have to reach to Ulhasnagar to take orders again I think this was when I was working in Zomato and it was 10 km plus ride just to go there and I got really sick from rain I lost 8 kg weight work over this time period and sick for 2 weeks and this video really made me feel better that someone is that who shows the pain we go through every day and quit this job late month because i am not able work and got exhausted and sick and weaker than ever before and it’s not been long I just recover from sickness I was joined this job 6 months of this year and quit 8 months starting and one last thing this motherfucker eat our money if you’re a customer you pay 50 rs delivery but we get 30 rs only I wish to burn down this mf companies

I am rider in swiggy.. bt to sahi kahi bhai ki company apki koi help nhi karegi chahe apko field mai koi b problem... ek incident mere sath b hua tha jiska solution abhi tk nhi hua...on april 29,2024. mere target mai ek order kam pad rha tha.. swiigy target based hai apne agar apne target nhi kiya to incentive nhi milta us din ka. to us raat ke kareeb 10:30 bj gye they ek order or krna tha mujhe meri last shift katm hone mai 30 min baki the to maine wo order accept kr liya. jb maine wo order pick kiya jo ki 124/- rupees ka tha . mere pas customer ki call ayi or wo bola ki ate huye cigerate ka packet lete ana to maine unko mna kr diya ki mere pas payment nhi hai jo thi i fuel up my bike. to unhone kha 1 cigerate hi la do mai yha ka nhi hu bahar ka hu to maine unko phir se mna kar diya. jab mai location par aya to wha pehle 5-6 ladke khade the or mere sath mar pith shuru kardi order mujse cheen liya mera phone b le liya unhone ..uske bad mai wha se kaise b krke bhaga then i wnt to nearest police station and filed FIR against them..but abhi tk kuch nhi hhua....also swiggy walo ne us order ke paise meri us din ki income se kat liye........to us 30 minute shift ko krne ke liye taki mera incentive mujhe mile jo kaam maine pura din kiya ..ulta mera nuksan ho gya around 25000 ka .....😔😔😔😔😔
Bahut mahnat ka kaam hai in bhaiyo ka... respect always

Hi Dhruv,

I really appreciate you making videos on major problems of the country.

But your content just about always just one side of the story.

Gig opportunities cannot be treated as full time employment, which unfortunately is the case in India.

You can just do such jobs temporarily until you find formal employment.

Gig jobs also have the advantage of leaving the job and working anytime.

Due to high employment, people with good qualifications are getting into gig work but it can never replace full time employment.

Being a Banking Educationist, I can vouch that there are hundreds of jobs that are available but no one wants to apply, coz of the taboo associated with Sales Jobs.

I would appreciate if you could shed light on the opportunities which are often overlooked by youth coz of the social stigma attached to it.

Thanks🙏
